name: The Real Me (demo)
description:
The Real Me gives classic survival horror a new coat of paint. Enter a world of horror inspired by films such as "The Shining", "Hereditary", and "I'm Thinking of Ending Things".

Play as Lily, a young woman trapped in a nightmare hotel, as she's chased by horrific creatures and a man she thought she knew.

*This is the first chapter of the game. The rest will be released as it is finished*

Design, art, and code by Thomas Keys.  Special Thanks to Megan Scarlet and Soren Fonnesbeck.

Intro Music Credit: 

Night in Venice by Kevin MacLeod | https://incompetech.com/ Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/ Creative Commons Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

*Warning* — contains gore and themes of abuse.

Enjoy!
